title: The Clay circus
creator_credit: Texture Films and Herman J. Engel
brief_description: Captures, without narration, the spirit of the circus. A clay sculpture, by Shay Rieger, inspired by the color, forms, and motions of the circus, are intercut with segments of actual circus acts.
description: Captures, without narration, the spirit of the circus. A clay sculpture, by Shay Rieger, inspired by the color, forms, and motions of the circus, are intercut with segments of actual circus acts.
